doc:
Joyce Van Patten https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joyce_Van_Patten 0 Joyce Benignia Van Patten (born March 9, 1934) is an American stage, film, and television actress, best known for the wry, astringent, and neurotic characters she portrays. Among many roles, one of her most recognized is that of the selfish and domineering Mother of Jason Beghe's character in the horror movie Monkey Shines (1988). Joyce_Benignia_Van_Patten ( born March_9_,_1934 ) is an_American_stage , film , and television_actress , best_known for the_wry_,_astringent_,_and_neurotic_characters she portrays . Among many_roles , one of her_most_recognized is that of the_selfish_and_domineering_Mother of Jason_Beghe 's_character in the_horror_movie_Monkey_Shines_(_1988_) .
